text: @DonaldJTrumpJr @realDonaldTrump You & Dad need to work on improving your Coronavirus messaging. Im a supporter but so far we are not seeing appropriate leadership on this issue. Your dad needs to take this very seriously & lead. This is most lethal virus since Spanish Flu. Its here. 3 weeks from now u will see.
